opinion.panel: Before JONES C. J., EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
opinion.posture:
Appeal, No. 268, Jan. T., 1973, from order of Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, Sept. T., 1965, No. 247, in case of Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. Donald White. Order affirmed.
Petition for post-conviction relief. Before DOTY, J.
Petition denied. Petitioner appealed nunc pro tunc.
opinion.attorneys:
Mary Bell Hammerman, for appellant.
David Richman, Assistant District Attorney, Richard A.Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
